font-weight: 500; font-style: normal; } @font-face { font-family: 'Avenir-Book'; src: url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.eot'); src: url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'), url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.woff2') format('woff2'), url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.woff') format('woff'), url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.ttf') format('truetype'), url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.svg#AvenirLT-Book') format('svg'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } @font-face { font-family: 'Avenir-Black'; src: url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.eot'); src: url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'), url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.woff2') format('woff2'), url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.woff') format('woff'), url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.ttf') format('truetype'), url('https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.svg#AvenirLT-Black') format('svg'); font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; } * { border: none!important; } /*Header Styles*/ .toolbar-background { background: linear-gradient(to right, #89181c, #59041c); } .header-md::after, .tabs-md[tabsPlacement="top"] > .tabbar::after, .footer-md::before, .tabs-md[tabsPlacement="bottom"] > .tabbar::before { content: none; } .toolbar-title { font-family: 'montserrat'!important; text-transform: uppercase; } button.search-button-header { display:none; } .back-button .back-button-text { display: none!important; } /* .bar-button ion-icon { font-size: 3.7rem; } .bar-button-menutoggle ion-icon, ion-icon.back-button-icon { display: inline-block; padding: 0 2vw; } */ /* ion-content.content { margin-top: -10vh!important; height: 110.5vh; } */ ion-app { background: #000; } .show-menu ion-header { display: none; } .show-menu .menu-inner { background: transparent!important; } .show-menu ion-list.list { margin: 0; padding-bottom: 6vh; padding-top: 6vh; } .show-menu ion-list.list:before { content: ""; background-image: url(https://gmchcapp2020.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/00-GMCHC-Icon1.png)!important; display: block; width: 52vw; height: 16vh; background-position: center; background-size: contain; background-repeat: no-repeat; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center; position: relative; width:90%; } .show-menu button.item { padding-left: 0; background: transparent; } .show-menu button.item .item-inner { padding: 0; flex-direction: column; } .landing .history { background-image: url(https://gmchcapp2020.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/00-GMCHC-Icon1.png)!important; } .contact-page .social-box { background: #82151c; padding: 4vh 4vw 6vh; margin-top: 3vh; } .tab-button-text { font-family: 'montserrat'!important; } .show-menu button.item ion-label { color: #fff; font-weight: 400; font-family: 'montserrat'; margin: 3vh 0; } .show-menu button.item.activated ion-label { color: #ecc229; font-weight: 700; } .connect-grid p { color: #fff; font-family: montserrat; font-size: 3.75vw; line-height: 1.3; margin: 2vh 4vw; } .show-menu ion-content { background: url(https://app.msbcministries.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/menuback.png) center/cover!important; } .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none; } .page-morning-star-home-page .giphy { width: 100%; position: absolute; top: 50vh; text-align: center; z-index: 1; animation: cssAnimationDisappear 0s 8s forwards; } .page-morning-star-home-page .giphy img { width: 10vw; max-width: 250px; } .page-morning-star-home-page div.cellular-instructions { color: #252525; position: absolute; display: block; font-size: 3vw; background: #eee; width: 100vw; left: 0; top: 40%; padding: 2vh 6vw 2.25vh; animation: cssAnimation 0s 8s forwards; visibility: hidden; z-index: 0; height: auto; } .page-morning-star-home-page div.cellular-instructions li { font-size: 3vw; margin: .75vh 0; color: #252525; } .page-morning-star-home-page div.cellular-instructions ol, .page-morning-star-home-page div.cellular-instructions ul { padding-left: 5vw; } .page-morning-star-home-page iframe.ap3-iframe { z-index: 10; position: relative; } @keyframes cssAnimation { to { visibility: visible; } } @keyframes cssAnimationDisappear { to { visibility: hidden; } } @media only screen and (max-width: 374px) { /* ion-content.content { margin-top: -12vh!important; height: 112.5vh; } */ } /* ----------- iPhone 5, 5S, 5C and 5SE ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width: 320px) and (device-height: 568px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) { } /* ----------- iPhone 6, 6S, 7 and 8 ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width: 375px) and (device-height : 667px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) { } /* ----------- iPhone 6+, 7+ and 8+ ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width: 414px) and (device-height : 736px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 3) { } /* ----------- iPhone X ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width : 375px) and (device-height : 812px) and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio : 3) { } /* ----------- iPad 1, 2, Mini and Air ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width: 768px) and (device-height: 1024px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 1) { } /* ----------- iPad Pro 12.9" ----------- */ /* Portrait and Landscape */ @media only screen and (device-width: 1024px) and (device-height: 1366px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) { } img.alignnone.size-medium.wp-image-1827.aligncenter { margin-top: -122px !important; }
